text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump FALSE

Per capita we are trailing and our reporting is disorganized and not accurately tracked.

At least two other countries have tested significantly more than us

https://t.co/xcXOBKa96P

#TrumpLiesPeopleDie 
#COVID19
#2019nCoV
#TestingForCovid19
